threats_detected.recommendation: Block IP, monitor for lateral movement, check other systems
IMMEDIATE ACTION: Block IP at firewall, isolate affected systems, initiate incident response

alert_rules_triggered.description: High volume of Suricata alerts (>=10 in 4h)
Single IP generating many alerts (>=5 in 4h)

integration_notes: Main data is in response_summary.threats_detected array
Each threat represents one attacking IP with actionable data
Poll every 1-5 minutes and check threat_count > 0
Focus on HIGH and CRITICAL severity threats
